識.definition: to record; to write a footnote

識別.definition: to distinguish; to discern; to identify; to recognize

識力.definition: discernment; the ability to judge well

識字.definition: to learn to read; able to read; literate

識微知著.definition: see 見微知著|见微知著[jian4wei1-zhi1zhu4]

識微見幾.definition: lit. see a tiny bit and understand everything (idiom)

識才尊賢.definition: to recognize talent and have great respect for it

識數.definition: to know how to count and do sums; numerate; numeracy

識時務.definition: to have a clear view of things; to adapt to circumstances

識時務者為俊傑.pinyin: shi2 shi2 wu4 zhe3 wei2 jun4 jie2
識時務者為俊傑.definition: (idiom) only an outstanding talent can recognize current trends; a wise man submits to circumstances

識羞.definition: to know shame; to feel shame (often with a negative, shameless)

識荊.definition: It is a great honor to meet you.

識荊恨晚.definition: It is a great honor to meet you and I regret it is not sooner

識途老馬.definition: lit. an old horse knows the way home (idiom); fig. in difficulty, trust an experience colleague
